content: Property Investments Savings Loans Retirement Asked by AnonymousAsked 3w agoShould I pay my monthly condo mortgage with CPF, and invest my rental cash?My monthly condo mortgage is $3800, I'm currently renting out my unit at $3600/month. My monthly CPF contribution to the loan is $500. Hence I have $300 "leftover" - should I invest this $300 (e.g. robo-advisors that possibly earn > 2.5%) OR reduce my CPF contribution to earn a safe 2.5%?Maintenance fees are paid separately by cash.1 answerAnswerBump1
